channel.title: Comments on: Four Whos, Three Avengers, and a Street Fighting Woman: Crossplay at DragonCon
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Weekly Wrap-Up - 9.20.14 - Luna Station QuarterlyLuna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Weekly Wrap-Up - 9.20.14 - Luna Station QuarterlyLuna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] We were lucky to have Sara Amis at DragonCon and she came back with a great story, and pictures, covering cross-gendered cosplay in “Four Whos, Three Avengers, and a Street-Fighting Woman“. […]
item.content:encoded: […] We were lucky to have Sara Amis at DragonCon and she came back with a great story, and pictures, covering cross-gendered cosplay in “Four Whos, Three Avengers, and a Street-Fighting Woman“. […]

item.title: By: Scylla Kat
item.dc:creator: Scylla Kat
item.description: This is my jam. I'm not sure how it caught on, but I love that it has. And the fact that it's bringing gender issues into the conversation is, I believe, a good sign.
item.content:encoded: This is my jam. I’m not sure how it caught on, but I love that it has. And the fact that it’s bringing gender issues into the conversation is, I believe, a good sign.
